name: Live Oak Bancshares, Inc.
description: Live Oak Bancshares, Inc. is a bank holding company based in Wilmington, North Carolina, dedicated to providing innovative financial solutions primarily to small businesses. Founded in 2008, the company has quickly established itself as a leader in the digital banking space, leveraging technology to streamline the lending process and enhance customer experience. Live Oak Bank, its wholly-owned subsidiary, specializes in small business loans, offering a diverse range of products including commercial loans, equipment financing, and real estate loans across various industries such as healthcare, agriculture, and hospitality. With a focus on serving underserved markets, Live Oak Bancshares embraces a mission to empower entrepreneurs through accessible financial solutions. The company is also known for its commitment to community engagement and contributing to economic development in the areas it serves. By harnessing data-driven insights and advanced technology, Live Oak Bancshares aims to transform the traditional banking model into a more efficient and customer-centric approach. As the banking landscape continues to evolve, Live Oak stands out for its dedication to innovation and service excellence.

seo.meta_title: Live Oak Bancshares, Inc. | Innovative Banking Solutions for Small Businesses
seo.meta_description: Explore Live Oak Bancshares, Inc., a leader in digital banking solutions for small businesses. Learn about our mission, products, and commitment to economic development.

faq.question: What does Live Oak Bancshares do?
faq.answer: Live Oak Bancshares provides innovative banking solutions primarily focused on small businesses.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of Live Oak Bancshares?
faq.answer: James S. (Chip) Mahan III is the CEO of Live Oak Bancshares, Inc.

faq.question: Where is Live Oak Bancshares headquartered?
faq.answer: Live Oak Bancshares is headquartered in Wilmington, North Carolina, USA.

faq.question: What types of products does Live Oak Bancshares offer?
faq.answer: Live Oak Bancshares offers commercial loans, equipment financing, real estate loans, and various banking services.

faq.question: When was Live Oak Bancshares founded?
faq.answer: Live Oak Bancshares was founded in 2008.
